article_title: True, misleading or outright lie: A guide to The Bee’s Ad Watch series
article_text: The Sacramento Bee has tested the tuth of television, radio and mailer ads in a handful of statewide and Sacramento-area political races on Tuesday’s ballot. Here is a compilation of the analyses, including ratings.

article_summary:
The Sacramento Bee has tested the tuth of television, radio and mailer ads in a handful of statewide and Sacramento-area political races on Tuesday’s ballot.
Here is a compilation of the analyses, including ratings.
